name: Flower-Shaped Machine Component
description: A flower-shaped machine component assembled from assorted materials. It enhances no attribute, nor possesses any function. A flower-shaped machine component is simply that â€” neither grand nor trivial.\nHumankind immortalizes cherished memories through crafted objects, and conveys unspoken gratitude through the giving of gifts. If this "flower" were to possess a language of its own, it might well speak of "remembrance" and "thanks."\nCoincidentally or not, its form bears a subtle resemblance to the Vanilla Planifolia, a crop once cultivated in the history of the Flower-Feather Clan.
